variable.label: Short Address
variable.tooltip: Only if CV29, Bit5=0 CV1

variable.label: Starting Voltage
variable.tooltip: CV2 x (1/255 Track Voltage) CV2

variable.label: Acceleration time
variable.tooltip: CV3 x 2ms x (1/255 Track Voltage) CV3

variable.label: Braking time
variable.tooltip: CV4 x 2ms x (1/255 Track Voltage) CV4

variable.label: Top Speed
variable.tooltip: CV5 x (1/255 Track Voltage) CV5

variable.label: Med-Speed
variable.tooltip: CV6 x (1/255 Track Voltage) CV6

variable.label: Software Version Number
variable.tooltip: The decoder version number (read only) CV7

variable.label: Manufacturer ID
variable.tooltip: The manufacturer's ID number (read only) CV8

variable.label: Motor Frequency
variable.tooltip: Factory pre-set (23.5 (16) kHz) is optimized for LGB motors. CV9

variable.label: F1 Function Output in Analog Mode
variable.tooltip: (On if value set) CV13

variable.label: F2 Function Output in Analog Mode
variable.tooltip: (On if value set) CV13

variable.label: F3 Function Output in Analog Mode
variable.tooltip: (On if value set) CV13

variable.label: F4 Function Output in Analog Mode
variable.tooltip: (On if value set) CV13

variable.label: F5 Function Output in Analog Mode
variable.tooltip: (On if value set) CV13

variable.label: F6 Function Output in Analog Mode
variable.tooltip: (On if value set) CV13

variable.label: Long Address
variable.tooltip: Sets the Extended 4 digit address (Range 128-10239) CV17-18

variable.label: Consist Address
variable.tooltip: Sets the multiple unit (consist) address, 0 = not in consist. CV19

variable.label: Consist Direction
variable.tooltip: Sets the relative direction of the loco when consist is told to move forward. CV19

variable.label: Driving Direction
variable.tooltip: Sets the relative direction of the loco when told to move forward CV29

variable.label: Speed Steps
variable.tooltip: Sets the speed step mode. 128 speed steps are recognized automatically CV29

variable.label: Analog conversion mode
variable.tooltip: Determines whether loco can operate on conventional DC current (enables Power Source Conversion) CV29

variable.label: Use Speed Table
variable.tooltip: Determines whether loco will use manufacturer's internal or user-defined speed step table CV29

variable.label: Addressing Mode
variable.tooltip: Determines whether loco will use short or long address CV29

variable.label: Data Processing
variable.tooltip: Automatic Detection of Serial/Parallel CV49

variable.label: Digital Load Control
variable.tooltip: Load Control keeps the loco speed constant even as the load varies. CV49

variable.label: Analog Load Control
variable.tooltip: Load Control keeps the loco speed constant even as the load varies. CV49

variable.label: F1 Output
variable.tooltip: F1 Output = Fast Pulse String (P-Update) on F1 ONLY WITH Data Processing = Serial + Parallel Data Processing. CV49

variable.label: Bus Type
variable.tooltip: Determines which protocol is used on the bus connection to other devices. CV49

variable.label: Light: Dimming Value (PWM)
variable.tooltip: Locos with interface = 32(full track voltage); direct connection of 5V bulbs = 5; direct connection of 19V bulbs = 26. CV50

variable.label: Front Light: Command Allocation - Direction
variable.tooltip: Direction for Front Light On CV51

enumChoice.choice: Front Light On in both directions
Front Light On in Reverse only
Front Light On in Standard Driving Direction only

variable.tooltip: Function key which switches Front Light CV51

variable.tooltip: Which special function, if any, for F2. For Monoflop, output is switched off automatically after timeout. CV57

variable.label: Pause Time for Stop and Reversing
variable.tooltip: 0.5 sec per Value CV58

variable.label: Back EMF Adjustment Factor
variable.tooltip: Big Value = Fast Regulation CV60

variable.tooltip: Big Value = Slow Regulation CV61

variable.label: Back EMF Adjustment Strength
variable.tooltip: 255 = max. Strength CV62

variable.label: Back EMF Start-up Behavior - Regulation Time
variable.tooltip: Adjusts the speed of load control regulation, 1-15. Only alter if instructed by manufacturer. CV63

variable.label: Back EMF Start-up Behavior - Triggering Level
variable.tooltip: Defines the switchover point from slow approach load control to regular load control. Only alter if instructed by manufacturer. CV63
